CustomField.formula: IF( Days_since_last_update__c <90, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015300000035QSR","Less than 90 Days",30,30) , IF( Days_since_last_update__c <365, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015300000035QSW","90 to 365 Days",30,30), IF( Days_since_last_update__c >365, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015300000035QSb","More than a Year",30,30) , IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015300000035QSb","More than 60 Days",30,30))))
CustomField.label: Update Status
